thread.title: Stardust Awards 2016: Shah Rukh Khan gets clicked with Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Amitabh Bachchan and it’s picture perfect – view pics!
thread.title_full: Stardust Awards 2016: Shah Rukh Khan gets clicked with Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Amitabh Bachchan and it’s picture perfect – view pics!

author: Karan Shah
title: Stardust Awards 2016: Shah Rukh Khan gets clicked with Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Amitabh Bachchan and it’s picture perfect – view pics!
text:
Shah Rukh Khan, Priyanka Chopra, Shahid Kapoor celebs who ruled Insta this week 
We love award functions for various reasons. One of the major one being the picture perfect moments. That special reunion, red carpet chemistry, diva-esque appearance leave us awestruck for some time. The Bachchan family is looking superb at the red carpet and look who has joined them for a picture. It is none other than Shah Rukh Khan . Too much charisma in one frame. Dressed in black, Shah Rukh Kha n is looking suave and handsome AF and we’re sure many can’t take eyes off him. Black is his trademark and he owns it. He has been joined by Aishwarya Rai Bachchan who is looking so stunning in a shimmery gown. It is by designer Rami Kadi. The Bachchan bahu has been styled by Aastha Sharma for this. 
Ever since Shah Rukh and Ash marvelled us in Ae Dil Hai Mushkil, hopes have been super high that they’ll soon do a film together. Okay, there’s time before that dream turns into a reality but for now, we have this pic to rejoice over! Isn’t this one epic pic? Having the Bachchan family in the same frame with their closest buddy, Shah Rukh? Of course, you may be wondering where Abhishek Bachchan is at this time. Well, he’s the host at Stardust Awards. For the evening, Abhishek, Riteish Deshmukh, Farah Khan and Manish Paul are entertaining the crowd at the awards function. While we do miss Jr Bachchan in this picture perfect moment, you have got to admit that it is one epic grab! (Also Read: Shah Rukh Khan’s GQ cover wins more hearts than Hrithik Roshan’s steamy Vogue issue) 
Fans are going to go berserk after seeing this picture, we can guarantee that. The Stardust Awards red carpet was a haven of star studded crowd. From Priyanka Chopra to Ranbir Kapoor, everyone has dressed to impress. In fact, many of them have aced the fashion game with their gorgeous ensembles. The winners list in the technical categories is out so in case you’ve missed it, you can check it out here. There’s a lot of excitement going on at the ceremony right now. So you guys stay tuned to this space and we’ll bring you all the details of the night. Don’t go anywhere! Published: January 8, 2017 7:20 pm Topics:
